queries.name: query0
queries.query: sum:statsd.minecraft_tick_duration_seconds.bucket{$service AND * AND $host AND upper_bound:0.* AND (NOT upper_bound:0.0*)} by {upper_bound}.as_count().rollup(min)

definition.content: Includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them (Linux only)

definition.title: Read requests issued per device per second
Write requests issued per device per second
Average time for read requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them (Linux only)

formulas.alias: Time for read requests issued to the device to be served

definition.title: Kibibytes read per device per second
Kibibytes written per device per second
Average time for write requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them (Linux only)

formulas.alias: Time for write requests issued to the device to be served

definition.title: Read requests merged per second, queued per device (Linux only)

formulas.alias: Read requests merged per second, queued

definition.title: Write requests merged per second, queued per device (Linux only)

formulas.alias: Write requests merged per second, queued

definition.title: Average service time for requests issued per device (Linux only)

formulas.alias: Average service time for requests issued

definition.title: % of CPU time spent running user space processes

formulas.alias: % of CPU time spent running user space processes

definition.title: % of CPU time spent running the kernel

formulas.alias: % of CPU time spent running the kernel

definition.title: % of CPU time spent in an idle state

formulas.alias: % of CPU time spent in an idle state

definition.title: % usable physical RAM as a fraction of the total
The amount of RAM in use with forecast

definition.content:
## Memory Allocation

Heap Memory allocated, that may be subsequently freed by GC.

## Contention

Time threads spent locked. Less is better

## Exceptions

Thrown Exceptions (caught + uncaught). 
Less is better.

## Network I/O

Time spent locked socket reading or writing

definition.title: The total amount of disk space per device
Amount of free and used disk space per device
The amount of disk space in use as a fraction of the total per device
Percent of time spent reading from disk per device
Percent of time spent writing to disk per device
